pma:database.name: bd_geo_code
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `upazilas` ( `id` int(3) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `district_id` int(2) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `bn_name` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `url` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `district_id` (`district_id`), CONSTRAINT `upazilas_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`district_id`) REFERENCES `districts` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=492 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
